introduction: I utilize my skills and experiences in sales/marketing technologies and business management to effectively scale, automate and deliver data solutions for lead generation programs.

topPrioritiesAndAchievements.description: I managed a global B2B database of 200M+ records and led a team of 10 research reps to support the delivery of 200 different projects monthly.
I accelerated advertising campaigns' delivery by 70% by advanced operational methods and enhanced customer satisfaction and retention.

additionalNotes: Check out my certification section, which includes Hubspot, AWS and IBM Data Science Specialization. I seek new challenges and opportunities to contribute my skills to a dynamic and innovative organization.
